title: File.Image.WorldFile
description: A file accompanying a File.Image.JPEG, File.Image.PNG or File.Image.TIFF containing the original pixel to 'world' coordinate transformation instructions. Typical file extensions are .jgw, .j2w, .pgw, .tfw, depending on the image type in context.

SpatialReference.title: Spatial Reference
SpatialReference.description: The geo-spatial reference for the data in the geo-referenced image file. The definition typically augments the information provided in the .jgw, .j2w, .pgw, .tfw  'world file'. Augmentation examples: 1) The designated CRS identified by CoordinateReferenceSystemID can be an early BoundCRS providing the selected transformation to WGS 84. 2) If the dataset represents 3-dimensional coordinates, the VerticalCoordinateReferenceSystemID provides the vertical reference. 3) If no vertical CRS is defined, the vertical unit is given by PersistableReferenceUnitZ.
